Frequently Asked Questions
‚ñ∏ What is AmbiOS?
AmbiOS is the world's first ambient operating system designed to eliminate silence from your life permanently. It runs exclusively on repurposed Roomba vacuum cleaners because Barnaby got a very good deal on 2,000 of them from a warehouse in Reno. "The building keeps moving because the building IS the product." ‚Äî Barnaby, during a 3am board meeting with himself.
‚ñ∏ Why Roombas?
Barnaby's original plan was to use repurposed Teslas but the deposit was $47,000 per unit. Roombas were $12 each at the Reno liquidation event. "Innovation is about constraints," Barnaby wrote in his journal. "Also, I only had $24,000."
‚ñ∏ My Roomba left my house. Is this normal?
Yes. Your Mobile Workstation is following its AmbiOS-generated path. It will return when the ambient conditions require it, or when its battery dies near a Denny's. Do NOT attempt to follow it. Gerald tried. Gerald has been walking for 11 days.
‚ñ∏ Does the tin foil hat actually work?
Define "work." Does it block silence frequencies? Our internal research (Barnaby, sample size 1) says yes. The FDA says we need to "stop claiming that." We say the FDA has clearly been compromised by Big Silence.
‚ñ∏ Can I invest in SonaTech?
We are currently accepting investments in the form of: (a) cash, (b) Roombas, (c) espresso beans (single origin only), or (d) philosophical validation. Current valuation: $4.7M (self-assessed). Previous investors include Barnaby's mom and a man named Carl who thought he was buying a lawnmower.
‚ñ∏ What happened at Oxford?
